name: Before Crisis: Remake
summary:
This is a fan remake and English translation of the mobile game Before Crisis, released only in Japan in 2004.

Before Crisis is set six years before the events of Final Fantasy VII. You get to see the daily life of the Turks, such as doing missions for the company and fighting against the first group of mercenaries known as AVALANCHE.

Famous characters of the Final Fantasy VII universe are present, such as Reno, Rude, and Tseng. But you play as Shotgun, a rookie starting her first day working for the Turks. You'll see her journey in those six years of meeting the new members, looking for a reason to keep fighting, and witnessing events leading up to the main game.
